description:
http://www.citytv.nl
Hans de Goede @ T-DOSE The place where experts meet on 5 and 6 November 2011, Eindhoven

State of Linux gaming

Author: Hans de Goede

Are you a Linux Desktop user, but do you still keep that windows partition around for Games? That really is not necessary! This talk will describe and showcase a selection of the many great games Linux has to offer. It will also touch up on the difficulties in developing / packaging 100% Free (as in freedom) games.
title: How to Linux Games, describe and showcase Linux games, by Hans de Goede
